title: Curse spells

properties.name: description
properties.value: Curses are spells mainly used to cause a negative effect to its target other than damage. Stat draining curses are rarely used as they are easily negated with stat restoration items and damage dealing or movement blocking spells are better.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Curse spells

Curses are spells mainly used to cause a negative effect to its target other than damage. Stat draining curses are rarely used as they are easily negated with stat restoration items and damage dealing or movement blocking spells are better.

Curse spells can only be used on the same target once the first spell wears off, the curse splashing does not apply the effect, and thus does not count.

Spells[edit | edit source]

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell Level Runes Required Experience Effect
Confuse 3 2 3 1 13 Reduces your opponents attack by 5%.
Weaken 11 2 3 1 20.5 Reduces your opponents strength by 5%.
Curse 19 3 2 1 29 Reduces your opponents defence by 5%.
Bind 20 3 3 2 30 Prevents your opponent from moving for 5 seconds.
Snare 50 4 4 3 60 Prevents your opponent from moving for 10 seconds. Can deal up to 3 points of damage.
Vulnerability 66 5 5 1 76 Reduces your opponents defence by 10%.
Enfeeble 73 8 8 1 83 Reduces your opponents strength by 10%.
Entangle 79 5 5 4 89 Prevents your opponent from moving for 15 seconds. Can deal up to 5 points of damage.
Stun 80 12 12 1 90 Reduces your opponents attack by 10%.
Teleport Block 85 1 1 1 80 Blocks target from teleporting for 5 minutes (half if they are using Protect from Magic).

rawContent:
{{External|rs}} '''Curses''' are [[spells]] mainly used to cause a negative effect to its target other than damage. Stat draining curses are rarely used as they are easily negated with [[stat restoration]] items and damage dealing or movement blocking spells are better. Curse spells can only be used on the same target once the first spell wears off, the curse [[splashing]] does not apply the effect, and thus does not count. ==Spells== {|class="wikitable sortable" !class="unsortable"|Icon !class="unsortable" |[[Mobile]]
